_sText:
my map is very small but i think my map is good and have potential, you should reach the hotel and defend in ! on the roof, a helico Pavelot is waiting for you... i let you download it and test it !

it s very balanced, trigger push, teleport with filter... look my video V1 of my map here : 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eEeAvGexwmM

Sorry for the people who aren't french... :)

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IS_h4vwbzTU

Add on V2 : remove bug, add balance for zombie, add light environement, env sun and lights, change some detail...
